## About the data

The ALMA Scorecard Hub is an initiative by the African Leaders Malaria Alliance that provides a comprehensive platform for tracking and monitoring progress in the fight against malaria across African countries. It offers detailed scorecards on various malaria indicators, facilitating data-driven decision-making and accountability among member countries to achieve malaria control and elimination targets.
